poster.username: R E D  S U G A R

body: The plot like this: https://nhentai.net/g/221460/ (there is a translation in other site)

I don't understand japanese but in page it appears the the blonde woman became or transformed into the wife of the evil dude and the knight guy became the daughter, that's some weird stuff but might as well read it so that I can question my morals once again.

@terminatorplay : someone pointed that out in Twitter as well. Both titles are produced under the TSF no F group though, so they might just be redoing it. Did the previous one even got finished? The story in that link seems like only part.
Looks like this TSF RPG Maker game: https://igasenpuki.exblog.jp/29695063/

Classic fallen to evil story, but would love to see it with longer story like something in lighter ero manga with plot :D | For the lore part (p19-20), the Dragon King came down to the world and give intelligence to living being. To the apes, he even shared his blood, so the apes holds a fragment of magical power in them. The apes, who now calls their race as human, multiply and eventually raised their weapon against the Dragon King, whom they now call Demon King. At least that's the lore from the dragon's side, no story from human's side.
